actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered reported H.R. 434 in lieu of this bill.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Forests and Public Land Management

official_title: A bill to provide for the conveyance of one (1) acre of land from Santa Fe National Forest to the Village of Jemez Springs, New Mexico, as the site of a fire sub-station.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to convey to Jemez Springs, New Mexico, specified real property within the Santa Fe National Forest in New Mexico in order to construct and operate a fire substation for Jemez Springs. Provides that such property shall revert to the United States if it is not used for such purpose.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the conveyance of one (1) acre of land from Santa Fe National Forest to the Village of Jemez Springs, New Mexico, as the site of a fire sub-station.
